Text: btw, i can only upload up to 150 kb/s so please be patient
skanero, I can up@64kbps and dl@300 kbps, its limited by my ISP =(
This is not like MKVtools 2.x which made AVI files.  This version make MKV files - only it seems.
This is not an update to MKVtools 2.x.  This version is a total restructuring in version 2.x into three apps.  This one makes MKV files from other media formats.
@divemstr i use it to transform DTS into AC3 (stupid LG tv won't play DTS files), this program does a pretty good job.
